On this date in 2006: 

Peja Stojaković became the first player to start a game by scoring 20 straight points for his team. He set a New Orleans Hornets record of 22 points in the 1st Q. He would score a career-high 42 points as the Hornets beat the Charlotte Bobcats 94-85.
